keyword: calories in a slice of bread
title: Calories in a Slice of Bread
meta_description: Discover calories in a slice of bread, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per slice for easy tracking.
h1: Calories in a Slice of Bread
assumptions: Standard white bread slice (~28 g), commercially baked, no added toppings or spreads.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, brand, slice thickness, and ingredients; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One slice of white bread has about 79 kcal and 15 g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a slice of white bread?
faqs.a: Approximately 79 kcal for a standard 28 g slice.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in a slice of bread?
faqs.a: About 15 g carbs per slice, mostly from refined flour.

faqs.q: Does whole grain bread have more calories per slice?
faqs.a: Slightly more, around 84 kcal, with higher fiber.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a slice of bread?
faqs.a: Roughly 150 mg, varying by brand and recipe.

faqs.q: Are there calories in gluten-free bread slices?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 70-90 kcal per slice, depending on ingredients.
